title.value: Содержание микрофлоры в колбасных изделиях и полуфабрикатах, изготовленных на мясокомбинатах Гродненской области [Беларусь]
The contents of microflora in sausage products and ready-to-cook foods produced by meat-packing plants of the Grodno area [Belarus]
The contents of microflora in sausage products and ready-to-cook foods produced by meat-packing plants of the Grodno area [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Nayulis, N.N., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The data of researches of the content of various bunches of microorganisms in different types of boiled, half-smoked both boiled-smoked sausages and forcemeat produced in OS 'Grodno meat-packing plant', 'Volkovyssk Meat-Packing Plant', 'Lida Meat-Packing Plant', in sausage shop of SPK 'Niva-2003' of the Grodno area of the Republic of Belarus are presented. Researches were spent in 2011-2012. It is established, that microflora of researched boiled, half-smoked and boiled-smoked sausages does not fall outside the limits admissible parameters. Direct bactericidal or bacteriastatical actions of food additives on the microorganisms allocated from researched products, it is not revealed.  The important role of finished products of launching cultures in formation of a microflora - Staphylococcus carnosus, Lactobacillus curvatus and Kocuria varians is shown. It is positioned that the use of vegetative additives in forcemeat conducts to development enterobacteria in it.
